attributes.action: Keep Chick-Fil-A open in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
This Petition:
- is intended only for the purpose to keep Chick-Fil-A in the UK to some capacity
- is not an act against the LGBT+ community
- does not condone any of Chick-Fil-A corporate beliefs
attributes.background:
1) Chick-Fil-A food is simply outstanding, in the opinions of many. Their customer service is something to marvel at. Every Briton should have the pleasure of trying it. 
2) The LGBT+ community protested them and shut them down. Now it's time for the rest of us to have a say and keep them open.
